properties.name: magneticHeading
properties.description: The heading in degrees from 0-359.99 at a single moment in time. (Number)

properties.name: trueHeading
properties.description: The heading relative to the geographic North Pole in degrees 0-359.99 at a single moment in time. A negative value indicates that the true heading can't be determined. (Number)

properties.name: headingAccuracy
properties.description: The deviation in degrees between the reported heading and the true heading. (Number)

properties.name: timestamp
properties.description: The time at which this heading was determined. (DOMTimeStamp)
